text: Howard Malcolm "Mac" Baldrige, Jr. (October 4, 1922 - July 25, 1987) was an American businessman. He served as the United States Secretary of Commerce from 1981 until his death in 1987. Baldrige died from injuries he suffered from a rodeo competition in Walnut Creek, California, aged 64. ==References== ==Other websites== *Howard M. title: Malcolm Baldrige Jr.
